description: Maps source files to E2E test tags for selective test running

mappings.description: Authentication components trigger auth E2E tests
Auth pages trigger auth E2E tests
Auth service triggers auth E2E tests
Dashboard page triggers dashboard E2E tests
FPL and user services trigger dashboard E2E tests
Router changes trigger navigation E2E tests
Protected route changes trigger both navigation and auth tests
Landing page triggers navigation E2E tests

notes: When a file matches multiple patterns, all tags are combined
If no pattern matches, defaultTags are used
Smoke tests should always be lightweight and fast
